description:
Does email run your life? Does your Inbox never end? You need this course. This course offers a proven system for managing your Inbox. It is filled with real tips and tricks that ANYONE can implement to take control of their email.

The course is structured as 13 lectures focusing on how to view your email, removing the clutter, and using a system of email management designed to make you focused and more productive.
title: Outlook Productivity
